TopicTitle: Waiter, theres a _____________ in my soup!

Articles.Content:
Here, a Cokatomic Bomb.

Waiter! This soup tastes like soup, but it's a soup soup, and soup soups should taste like Souptime!

And also, there's a New page in my soup!

Edited February 12, 2022 by Venusian Explorer

Waiter: Thank you Sir. I shall retrieve that, wouldn't want to lose the recipe.

Customer: Some leek soup and a plug please.

You have a soup dispenser on the wall. Serve yourself, please.

Waiter! Why is the restroom still occupied? Is it a think tank sink?

It's because our chef is having problems with last night's oysters.

Waiter! Why is my soup spicier than your "friend"?

Because Gordon Ramsay Forgot where's the Lamb Sauce.

Waiter! There's a Principia in my soup, and it's somehow crazy in terms of Orbital Physics!

Three-ingredient physics:

  1. Liquid
  2. Flavour
  3. Whatever you want to put

Waiter! Why is there a gravity formula here?

That's not a Gravity Formula, that is the Krusty Krab Secret Ingredient!

Waiter! Where's my Super Soup?!

Waiter: It was sent out for Dry Cleaning.

Customer: Is this an endless bowl of soup?

Yes, once you eat it you'll be able to play Half-Life 4.

Waiter! this soup has some nasty brocollies! WHY IN THE NAME OF SPARTACUS YOU GAVE ME THIS?!?!

To make you ask for an antidote in the name of Crassus.

Waiter! Are you sure that this rotten fish sauce is an authentic Ancient Roman dish? Now I understand that Spartacus.

Sorry, but that is our Soy Bean equivalent. Guarenteed just as awful.

Customer: Spaggetti and Meatballs please.

Inactivity and silence you receive.

Waiter! There is a stolen version track of Swift's song!

It’s fine, drink it!

Waiter! A SSTO crashed into my soup

Congratu-lences.

Waiter! There are ads!

Sorry, but we use ads to earn money. 

Waiter! There's a Tsar Bomba in my soup and it's gonna explode!

Sorry but that is only our Spicy Meatballs.

Customer: I think I see K9 over there. Is he hungry?

Sorry but our soup can cause illusions. 

Waiter! There's a bag of poison in my soup!

Then bag it up!

Waiter! There's a sewing kit here!

Eat it. It's fine.

WAITER! Why There's a fusion reactor in my soup!

EC! You'll never have to pay for your bills again, as our dear customer ColdJ requests.

Waiter! The soup is frozen!

You need a Tsar Bomba. 

Waiter! There's a waiter in my soup!

My brother!

Waiter! There's a menu here!

How can you be scared by your menu? 

Waiter! There's a reason in my soup!

reasons are lampposts.

WAITER! get out of my soup!

But it's tasty!

Waiter! there's some air in my soup!
